name: The Others (itch) (Adriano Silva)
description:
Ending D - "Different" ending, one of the hardest endings to "find", it changes the game narrative entirely...

Ending C - "Common" ending, the average end, almost bad as the bad ending.

Ending B - "Bad" ending...

Ending A - the "Amazing" one. It reveals things beyond any other ending.

Words from the GameDev:

I'm proud to be able to deliver this game after months of hard work and correction. I hope no bugs are found after all the testing it went through. This game's success is part of my plans and motivate me to make more games.
Thank you for visiting this page and/or playing my game! 

"The Others" is only playable on PC.
If Windows defender tries to block the game install, it is due to the engine being unknown to it, don't worry, it is completely safe to run it.
"The Others" was made in 160x144 resolution, according to the Gameboy's screen, but can be resized while in windowed mode or fullscreen.
